item.description:
In honor of our fabulous network of Moms, we're offering Baby Yoga on Mother's Day Weekend.  Whether Dads or other caretakers attend while Moms are getting a well-deserved rest, or Moms take this special time to bond with their babies, we hope you'll join us!

...A mother is a person who seeing there are only four pieces of pie for five people, promptly announces she never did care for pie.  ~Tenneva Jordan

BABY Itsy Bitsy Yoga Class Description (newborns to pre-crawling):
Baby Itsy Bitsy Yoga classes contain dozens of unique yoga postures designed to support baby’s development. Each class is filled with calming, nurturing ways to enhance bonding and improve baby’s sleep.

During class, babies enjoy yoga while on their backs, tummies, or held in loving arms. For parents, this class is a special opportunity to meet other parents in the community, and learn about baby's emerging personality. Most of the yoga we do in Itsy Bitsy Yoga is for your baby, but you will also learn breathing and relaxation techniques as you practice a bit of yoga yourself.
No yoga experience is required. Thank you for arranging just 1 parent/caregiver per family.

Cost: $15 includes 1 parent+1 child. (pre-payment required w/ YES RSVP).
A single YES RSVP will include you and your child. 


 Itsy Bitsy Yoga was created by Helen Garabedian, an Infant Developmental Movement Educator, yoga teacher, and mother. Learn more at www.ItsyBitsyYoga.com

Please note that we cannot refund or offer credit for schedule conflicts or unexpected illness.
item.name: Weekend BABY Itsy Bitsy Yoga Meetup May 2012--in honor of Mother's Day!
